backend/main.mo: Defines authentication, user profiles, permissions, servers, channels, messages, audit types, and includes authorization mixin with state initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a new profile settings button to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists high-level summaries for all frontend source files, describing functionality across layout, navigation, settings, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component controlling auth flow, profile setup, theming, navigation, and main UI shell rendering.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Authentication context managing session restore, validation, login, registration, logout, and backend connection handling.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Utility for saving, loading, validating, and clearing authentication session data in localStorage.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Hook wrapper returning the authentication context.
Re-usable layout for authentication screens with centered card UI and title/description.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Renders a category section with text/voice channels, supports drag-and-drop reordering, and opens the create-channel dialog.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Provides a modal to create a new category, with backend validation and submit handling.
Modal for creating text or voice channels within a category, with type selection and guarded backend actions.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message input box for sending text messages, handling disabled states and quick-send on Enter.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays messages for the selected channel with auto-scroll and includes the composer for sending new messages.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a single chat message with avatar, author metadata, timestamp, and role-colored name.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Server discovery page that filters community servers by search and allows joining them.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Card UI showing server info and a button to join the server.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Displays the Direct Messages home screen or forwards to the Friends view depending on navigation state.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Renders a single friend entry with avatar, status, and action buttons like message, call, and menu options.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Provides the main friends interface with tabs for online, all, pending, blocked, and adding friends, including request handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Defines the desktop layout with server rail, channel sidebar, main content, and optional member list panel.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses which main view to display based on navigation state, including home, discovery, server channels, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Defines the mobile layout using sliding sheets for servers, channels, and members, plus top bar navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Switches between mobile and desktop shells based on screen width.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Displays the member list for a server with avatars, role-colored names, and member selection handling.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Shows server channels organized by categories with admin drag‑and‑drop ordering and category creation.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Renders the mobile top bar containing server/channel navigation buttons, title, and user settings access.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Renders a vertical server navigation rail with home, server list, and add‑server actions, using ordering and backend-guard state.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog for initial profile setup allowing users to enter and save a display name.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Dialog to assign or remove server roles from a user with pending‑state handling and role fetch logic.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: User profile overlay showing avatar, banner, details, roles, and optional role‑management controls.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Dialog for creating a new server with name and description, guarded by backend‑action restrictions.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Displays a server’s icon or a fallback initial with styling for hover transitions.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog component for creating text or voice channels, handling form state, category selection, and submission via mutation hooks.
Dialog for moving a channel to another category, providing category selection and invoking an onMove callback.
Panel for selecting a server member, viewing their roles, and opening a role‑management dialog.
Page that loads, formats, sorts, and displays server audit log entries with event details and timestamps.
Page for listing categories and channels, reordering channels, and opening the create‑channel dialog using ordering utilities and admin checks.
Page for editing server settings such as description, images, and community mode, with save functionality via mutation.
UI panel to select a server member and view or manage their assigned roles via a dialog.
Displays server roles, allows creating new roles with permissions, and embeds the member role assignment panel.
Main shell for server settings with sidebar navigation and routed pages like overview, roles, channels, and audit log.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Lets users change theme and adjust text scaling settings.
Loads and edits user profile data including name, bio, status, avatar, banner, and username.
Container for user settings pages with navigation, logout control, and page switching.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Shows backend connection status and errors with retry and troubleshooting steps.
Renders a stage channel view with speakers, audience lists, and a raise-hand control.
Renders a voice channel view showing participants, connection state, and controls for joining or leaving a voice channel.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Provides a simple guard indicating whether backend actions should be disabled based on backend connection state.
Establishes and monitors backend connection readiness using a safe actor and periodic health checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Tracks whether the window width is below a given breakpoint to detect mobile layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Handles user logout by calling the auth provider and clearing React Query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides typed React Query hooks for backend operations such as user profiles, usernames, servers, channels, and voice presence.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor with retry and error handling, supporting both authenticated and anonymous identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and utility classes for the application's design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements a login and registration UI with form validation and auth handling.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Provides navigation state and helpers for switching views, servers, channels, and settings.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Manages notification overrides in localStorage and checks mute states for servers and channels.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Stores and updates user settings such as theme, accent color, text scale, notification prefs, and keybinds.
frontend/src/utils/channelOrdering.ts: Applies and builds channel/category ordering by merging persisted ordering with server data.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Removes a specific button via XPath and sets up a MutationObserver to keep it removed.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Validates hex role colors and computes contrast or lightness for text visibility.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter parsing, session persistence, and cleanup for both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it doesn't resolve in time.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s metadata, feature lists, and state versioning for the Caffeine Chat project.
